channel.title: Special Interest Group Interoperability - Interesting resources
channel.description:
_(This is a wiki post that anyone can edit, by clicking the 'Edit' link in the bottom-right corner of the post)_
Here we collect a list of interesting resources, organizations and people that can help us with our lobbying efforts to make ActivityPub a broadly supported interoperability standard.
---
- [**Interoperability News**](https://interoperability.news/) (fedi: [@InteropNews@activism.openworlds.info](https://activism.openworlds.info/@InteropNews))
